thread.title: 12 orthopedic surgeons treating professional athletes — September 2015

author: mwood@beckershealthcare.com (Megan Wood)
title: 12 orthopedic surgeons treating professional athletes — September 2015
text:
12 orthopedic surgeons treating professional athletes — September 2015 Featured Written by Megan Wood | Tuesday, 06 October   
Here are 12 orthopedic surgeons treating professional athletes this past month. 
David M. Epstein, MD , is providing orthopedic medical coverage to US Open athletes. 

Oakland A's Ike Davis will undergo hip surgery performed by Marc Philippon, MD . 

James Andrews, MD , performed elbow surgery on Washington Nationals' Aaron Barrett. 

Pittsburgh Panthers' running back James Conner underwent knew surgery performed by Volker Musahl, MD . 

William Schobert, MD , repaired volleyball player Kerr Walsh Jennings' dislocated shoulder. 

Christopher Larson, MD, Gregory Lervick, MD , and J. Chris Coetzee, MD , will provide care for the Minnesota Vikings. 

Louis Jenis, MD , will perform lumbar microdiscectomy surgery on Boston Bruins defenseman Dennis Seidenberg. 

Neal ElAttrache, MD , is slated to examine Kansas City Royals reliever Greg Holland's elbow. 

James Andrews, MD , performed knee surgery on Baltimore Ravens rookie Breshad Perriman. 

William Meyers, MD , will perform sports hernia surgery on Seattle Mariners' Robinson Cano in Philadelphia.
